content: i created this pattern as a challenge to myself when i only had three balls of noro on hand -- two kureyon and one retro solid i just wanted to share my little pattern and was expecting only a few people would be interested i m overwhelmed by the attention this has received - more than 36k downloads as of jan 2019 - and am grateful for the many kind comments and beautiful projects i hope you ll enjoy knitting this pattern but please keep in mind that this a free pattern and doesn t come with the usual pattern support if you re having trouble with the stitch pattern i suggest you turn to your local yarn store - i m sure they ll be happy to assist you ------------------------- you can easily make the shawl larger using more yarn since the pattern calls for knitting until you run out of yarn you can also use more than three colors of yarn my first sample knit with two kureyon and one retro measured about 70 x 22 after wet-blocking this pattern is available in french madlaineyarn 1 has kindly provided a translation thank you madlaine and it s also available in danish -- translation kindly provided by marianne holmen 2 thank you marianne 1 http //www ravelry com/people/madlaineyarn 2 http //www ravelry com/people/marianneho
